text: I had an incredible meal at North Indian Buffet in Singapore. The food was delicious and full of authentic flavors—especially the butter chicken and paneer tikka. The place was clean, and the staff were friendly. Definitely worth a visit!

Just tried North Indian Buffet in Singapore, and it was fantastic! The food was bursting with authentic flavors, with standout dishes like the butter chicken and paneer tikka. Clean space, friendly staff—highly recommend!

Visited North Indian Buffet recently and loved it! The flavors were spot-on, especially the creamy butter chicken and spicy paneer tikka. The restaurant was clean, and the service was great. A must-try for North Indian food lovers!
